column2: After a lot of turmoil in our European holdings, and the Great Powers of Europe, not considering we can keep everything under control, try to force us into accepting a humiliating treaty.
We are in no position to fight this back.
Great Powers of Europe, we are not giving up any land.
The Ottoman Empire denies our petitions.
After the Convention, they still think they have an opportunity to fight us back.
This land was an autonomous province under Otooman rule, maybe it is time for us to take it back to Bulgaria.
It is Bulgarian and will be in Bulgaria.
After allowing Austria-Hungary to annex Bosnia, the Ottoman is too weak to try and stop us.
Hungarians, feeling our weakness, are asking for more autonomy, and we cannot stop them... for now,
We say yes to everything you ask for.
IDK 'bout you, but I am feeling 22 and Hungarian.
A wave of revolts in Venetia is threatening our dominions there.
Venetia is Austrian and must remain as so!
A Venetia a day keeps the doctor away.
A wave of revolts in Lombardy is threatening our dominions there.
Lombardy is Austrian and must remain as so!
A Lombardy a day keeps the doctor away.
Krakow should be neutral, but in fact they are a destabilizing factor, why not to take them out of the way?
An Austrian ambassador showed up today asking if we were willing to support them against Krakow.
And he can go back with the news: we don't.
An Austrian ambassador showed up today asking if we were willing to support them against Krakow.
And he can go back with the news we don't.
They allow us to annex them, and we won't waste any time.
Let's show them who is boss here!
Now that we are more stable, we can finally take down Hungary and their annoying autonomy.
Get ready Hungary, here we come.
Seeing our revolution fail, we have the opportunity to keep fighting if we unite.
Lombardy and Venetia are one country, with one government.
Egypt once fought us to gain more territory, now we want those lands back...
Egypt is our land and it will remain as so.
Following our embarassing defeat, we must follow whatever our Lord demans.
And they want a lot from us.
We will get our rightful lands.
Dominican people has been under Haitian rule for too long, seems like it is unstoppable.
Dominican Republic was occupied by Haitians, no more!
Haitians fight with machetes, we got guns, we have killed more than 2 thousand in less than a day, and then they want us to surrender.
They have got to stop this carnage.
We fight with machetes, they got guns, they have killed more than 2 thousand in less than a day, and then we want them to surrender.
After all, Haiti is tired and has lost more men than exppected.
Doesn't matter the people who die, Haiti wants La Española to remain united!
Let's request aid from the US.
The US has been seeing everything from away, but maybe we should aid some who need it.
The war ended, now it is time we secede the territory they demand.
Now that the war ended, and we ended up on the winning side, we must take what is rightfully ours.
That is all the land we deserve.
Today, their diplomats arrived and simply said they want to leave the federation either we are comfortable with such action or not, what should we do?
Of course, we won't allow that.
Today is the day to fight the union.
Today, their diplomats arrived and simply said they want to leave the federation either we are comfortable with such action or not, what should we do?
Of course, we won't allow that.
Today is the day to fight the union.
Today, their diplomats arrived and simply said they want to leave the federation either we are comfortable with such action or not, what should we do?
Of course, we won't allow that.
Today is the day to fight the union.
Today, their diplomats arrived and simply said they want to leave the federation either we are comfortable with such action or not, what should we do?
Of course, we won't allow that.
Today is the day to fight the union.
Is it worthy of the try.

After trying to take some land back, it is noticeable that people don't want an union, that we don't have enough troops to fight this back, and that our people is already exhausted for this warry action.
El Salvador will show them who is right.
El Salvador is being invaded, now we have to let their regiments enjoy the poor land we are living in.
Algeria has been independent for too long, it is time for us to step in and make them ours.

After many years of not recognising Belgium's independence. It is time to choose a settlement. The Great Powers of Europe gathered in London and offer us a treaty, should we just keep our head held high or should we allow them to exist?
Belgium is ours and we won't make up our mind!.
After a lot of back and forth, the Netherlands agrees on the terms of the treaty, do we accept?
Yes! The Netherlands will finally recognise our existence.
No, we will not secede any territory.
After a long time, the Belgian delegation does not agree on the terms of the treaty, so we have the opportunity to take them back!
A lot of reports have been delivered to us saying Vietnamese riots have been killing missionaries, so we have to protect them against those filthy uncivilized Vietnamese people.
Some missionaries have been prosecuted in our country, for such small things, France is coming to us with an excessive reaction to this, and we conclude they just want our land.
People might get angry, but we cannot do a thing to change this.
$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats can go back to $FROMCOUNTRY$, we are not going to allow them to step on us.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ controls Saigon, and now thinks it is a good idea to control all the south of our country, they convinced our king in them and the governor resigned after accepting, should we ratify this?
We can do absolutely nothing about this.
After our success in the Saigon campaign, it is time we demonstrate who is the one in charge in Indochina.
Dai Nam will not refuse our petition.
Now that Vietnam is ours, it is time we expand our foothold in Indochina. Siam has a lot of Lao and Cambodian people, maybe we can take advantage from this.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ want our lands, and they want them now. After manufactoring another casus belli claiming we were causing conflict in the border.
We have to accept their terms,

We have been waiting for this moment, after a constitutional crisis and the King's inability to form a government, the Norwegian parliment stated a declaration claiming the disolution of the union with Sweden. Now it is time to see what they think of this.
And we mean every single word in that declaration.

After a constitutional crisis and the King's inability to form a government, the Norwegian parliment stated a declaration claiming the disolution of the union with Sweden. Now it is time to see what we should do.
The public and the International Community support their independence, maybe we should as well.
They want war, they will get war.
Poland was once a big and powerful country, and we should get that splendour back!
Poland now controls what is so called theirs, maybe t is time we ronounce to our previous claims to that land.
We control some of our rightful lands, but, where do we want to go after we get all of them?
The Balkans is our rightful land.
Today, we have been approached with a petition, to support them with their claims on Congo, should we?
After asking for their support, they said they would stand by our side, and now with everything on our favour, we can take ove the Congo.
Yay! We will do our best to civilise those cannibals and stupid monkeys!
Now it is time we expand to the borders we had aggreed on.
We have been interested on Lybia since the Crimean war, and the Great Powers have supported our petition, now it is time for us to take what is ours.
We will leave Lybia to the Turks.
An ultimatum was presented to the Ottoman government on the night of 26–27 September 1911. We are not sure what to do in this tense situation.
We want to talk and negotiate before deciding the fate of our lands.
We are stronger than they think, let's solve this militarily.
They answered through an Austro-Hungarian diplomat, they want to negotiate with us to reach a compromise.
We've got enough time from Italy to decide the fate of our colony. what will we do?
We have to secede our territory.
After knowing our rquest, and talks breaking down, we have done everything in our power to protect our interests, they brought this upon themselves.
And there is nothing else we can do.
After our war, and the liberation of this land, we have to make a pacific annexation possible.
Now that we have pacified this land, it is time to fully annex them.

In 1894, the magistrate of Gobu, Jo Byeonggap, had created various oppressive laws and forced the peasants to build reservoirs and settle in unowned lands in order to get rich from taxes and fines. Angry peasants tried to take Gobu. At first they failed, but eventually the city was captured by the rebels. The government reached a deal with them, but secretly asked Chinese troops into Korea in order to calm the waters, but that might anger Japan.
Chinese troops had crossed the border to aid the Korean government, but they didn't notify us of this situation, as it was previously dealed. Now we have a pretext to get them out of Korea.
Korea must be free from those Chinese incompetents.
Some of our troops have been dispatched to The Kingdom of Joseon, and that angered Japanese government, now they demand us to leave Korea, and recognise their influence on it.
We won't allow their insolence frighten us.
They accept everything and will recognise our influence on Korea.
China is not willing to accept our terms, so we will force said terms on them.
Now with Korea under our firm control, we can start the anexation of the peninsula into our territory.
After a long time mistreating Irish to the point of killing around one third of their population, they rose up in arms against us.
After a long war, it is time we recognise Ireland as its own thing, away from us.
After a long time struggling for independence, we have finally reached the point we have the support of the USA, and they will help us in this struggle.
Panama declared its independence, but now we have the opportunity to answer back our response.
Panama's existence is not an option.
After a long rebellion in the island of Cuba, we have the perfect pretext to take away Spanish colonies once and for all.
Those will be rightful American lands.
The Spanish-American war has been a humiliating failure for us, now, without La Havana, we are very close to give up on this.
God is giving us a sign.
Limburg has been an integral part of the German Confederation, and now that it was annexed by the Netherlands, we must claim it back.
After claiming Limburg to be only ours, Germany does not support that idea, and now they are claiming it to be theirs. What should we do now?
We will let this cool down eventually.
We have to give that land up.
After a time, German interest in this land has dissipated, now we can claim it is only ours.
German anger wasn't everlasting, just as we predicted.
Ours eyes have always been fixed on expansion, and Germany supported our will to purcharse Luxembourg, so we have to ask The Netherland's king.
Now we have to propose that to the King of the Netherlands.
France asks us to sell them Luxembourg, but first we have to ask Germany.
Yeah, Germany must give us permission.
No, we won't accept the deal.
We have the permission of everyone, and the Netherlands agrees on selling it.
We have been notified that Luxembourg will be bought by France, we have to avoid this move.
We have to reunite all powers and let them choose if they cupport France or us.
Germany has reunited all of us to try and stop France from purchansing Luxembourg, and nowit is our time to choose either we support one side or the other.
After trying to force us into using only the port of Buenos Aires for trading, Argentina is now moving their army towards us, we have to defend our land!
Now that Urquiza rules over all of Argentina, Buenos Aires is not going to avail his dictatorship, therefore, will not sign the Confederation treaty, putting an end the union with them.
We will follow the path of the Confederation.
We will follow the path of Buenos Aires.
Now, that Argentina is united and stable, we are a good place for foreigners to live.
Time to annex the rest of Buenos Aires.
Now that Buenos Aires exists, it is imperative we try to gain more land.

Governor of Buenos Aires, Juan Manuel José Domingo Ortiz de Rosas, used to step down from his position as a political move to show his popularity, the rest of the governors from the other provinces were always begging him to stay. On 1951, Rosas resigned and the governor of Entrerrios, Justo José de Urquiza, unexpectedly decided to recognise for the first time that Rosas had stepped down and someone else had got to take his position. The provinces of Corrientes and Santa Fé support Urquiza, while the rest support Rosas.
Entre Ríos is de facto independent now.
After a lot of struggle, Entre Ríos gave up, and now it is time to unify our country.
Now that Entre Rios is pacified, we can unify Argentina.
Having reached a deal with Buenos Aires in 1859, we thought it was the end of their rebellion, but now they want to unify the country under their banner.
Buenos Aires is the strong and right one.
We have won the war orf unification, and it is time to do as we have planned.
The old regency of Río de La Plata had claimed that land as Argentinian, now, with the military power to do so, we have to pacify that region.
We have claimed el Chaco Boreal to be Paraguayan since independence, now, with the military power to do so, we have to pacify that region.
After gaining all territories we claim ours, we can propose fixed border for both of us to avoid future conflict.

Chile and Argentina have historically claimed La Patagonia as an integral part of their country, even though none really controlled it at all. Now, with the sources availbale, it is time to pacify, conquest and ocupy those territories.
Now that we control a good porcion of northern Patagonia, we can expand our might even more to the South.
With The Northern portion conquered, now we can give our full attention to the South.
So Chile won't have the opportunity to conquer it first.
With the fear of England taking over the strait of Magallanes, we should go and take it first.
England should stop butting into our continent.
It took us a long time, but now our territories are connected and pacified.
A long Chile is a happy Chile.
Taking Tierra del Fuego might be a risky move, but we had the opportunity to take it first.
And as so, it is Chilean.
Argentinian diplomats have come to us requesting a better settlement for Tierra del Fuego, maybe it is our sign to reach a deal in order to avoid conflict with them in the near future.
Isla Grande will be divided in half.
The union is a threat to our independence and existence. As they owe us a lot of money, we want to take this opportunity to ask for our money and if they can peacefully stop their unification.
Knocking the door is not ining.
Chile sent a diplomat to ask if we could stop our union. They see us as a threat, but are we ready to fight them back in the case of war?
Yes, we are ready for war.
No, we are going to accept their terms.
The Confederation ignored our demand. Now they will face war.
War they asked for, war they will get.
Many peruvians in government are thinking of independence as an option.
Peruvian northeners have been thinking of leaving the union. We must stay together at all costs.
We have no option, Peru is free now and we don't have the military power to stop them.
We have got to find our own way.
Having won the war against Peru, we are now ready to become one nation with one people.
Now, with Tarija under control, Bolivian diplomats try to reach a settlement that would benefit both of us. Should we accept?
Acre is our land, and we won't stop claiming it any time soon.
The rebellious Polish people who have been oppressed by us are now organising under a free government and now they want us out of their country.
This is an event that will allow you to choose between having crisis in 1836 or 1870.

The British have been advancing into Venezuelan land since the 50's. They have tried to reach the Orinoco delta. President Antonio Guzmán Blanco broke diplomatic relations with the British and tried to militarily stop their advance. The USA involved eventually into this crisis to aid Venezuela.
After trying to advance into Venezuela territory, they have broken relations with us and The USA is now supporting them.

Britain, The USA and Venezuela have agreed on arbitration, and came to us for this (The panel of arbitration was never composed by French members though. The panel of arbitration was formed by Russian, British and American delegates.).
French arbitration, supporting Venezuela, has forced us to secede the soil Venezuela claims.

Tensions have risen for the important resources in Atacama between Chile, Bolivia and Peru. Now that Bolivian government has seized Chilean investors in the zone, Chile demands  this territory as a compensation.
Chilean inversions have been expropiated by the Bolivian government, and now they want to soolve this issue.
They left us with no options.
This is to avoid ugly borders :P
I don't stand ugly borders, and Erodes is sexy uwu
Tacna is Peruvian, and we should give it back.
They claim to be too diferent from us, and now they want to rule themselves.
After a revolution, Yucatecan government wants to be annexed back to Mexico.
After the successful independence of Texas, other parts of our country want to be like them.
They tried to become independent and now we have to stop them.
Sokoto is too big for its own being (Not historical at all, but for the sake of a decent colonization of Africa).
After the caliph was deposed by a violent revolution, Turkey is now vulnerable to minorities. Without a symbol to keep us together, we are permanently divided.
But Turkey will rise stronger than ever.
Epirus region has beeen encouraged to revolt against our mighty and noble hand by those Greeks. It is time to teach them a lesson.
Epirus sounds like a cool name, lemme test it.
Albanian people have been under our rule for centuries now, but a wave of nationalism created instability in the region, until they decided to open rebel against us.
And we will openly crush them.
An imperial decree overthrowing the house of Tokugawa from power was issued by Emperor Meiji earlier today. This unacceptable move will bring all of Japan into chaos.
Let's show damyos who is the leader here.
The northern island of Hokkaido has been de juer part of Japan, but now we have the power to control it.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has given us a lot of aytonomy over the years. but with the Polish uprising, that is now a myth. They request our inmediate annexation to the lands of the empire.
We will fight for our independence beside Poland and Lithuania.
We have has a dispute with Argentina since our independence over this strip of land. Now we have the power to seize it.
Our conflicts over disputed territories have been long, now it is time we claim and take those lands that are rightfully ours.
An American delegate has been sent to our lands to negociate a purcharse of what they claim, should be theirs for their manifest destiny.
After our evident and inminent defeat, we can sign a treaty so they will respect our core territory while they take over the north.
They have signed the treaty, now the land is ours.
They won't relent their claims over those lands even if we seize them.
Appropiate lands for the construction of trains that connect the west to the east coast are necessary for the development of The USA. We can sell more land or face war again.
Santa Ana was captured tonight and has signed a treaty that maks the end of this war. will the Mexican government respect that treaty?
We have no other option than reuqesting help from our ally.
He has come today to request aid in their ongoing war against Mexico. Should we intervene?
Panjab is part of India, and we must take it as soon as possible.
Let's subjugate people who defend themselves with arrows.
With no real solution to the Oregon problem, both parties are now in to solve it by arms.
May God have mercy of us all.
Brazil demands this territory from us, should we hand it over?
Now that we are in a total war, we have no option but to win.
WIth the end of the war, our enemies now can dismantle our whole empire.
We have no option but accept our fate.
Now, that we have survived terrible times, we will see properous times out of the ashes of our enemies.
The war has fallen upon us, and now we have to pay for our actions.
The best wheat is in Hungary, the most important factories in Prague. Now we are just a little nation with hunger and shame.

La crisis política y la inestabilidad que vino después de la muerte de Joaquín Crespo durante el liberalismo amarillo fue el detonante de este movimiento. Así que el 23 de mayo de 1899, Cipriano Castro cruza el Río Táchira en dirección a Caracas. 60 hombres andinos comenzaron este golpe de estado. En la batalla del Tocuyito, los rebeldes ganan, y con las fuerzas de los caudillos que lo apoyan toman Caracas el 23 de Octubre, dando inicio a la hegemonía andina.
Venezuela seguirá sin dictadores por ahora.
Now, with Mexico City under our control, we must seek for an emperor to control the country, the Second Mexican Empire will rise!
Maximiliano I de Habsburgo-Lorena y Carlota de Saxe-Coburg-Gotha son la mejor opción.
Now that France and its puppet control Mexico city, we have to fight for our independence and dignity.
Now that the Empire has been defeated, we can go back to normal.
Now that the empire has won, we can rule over all of Mexico.

This event is triggered with any genocide that happens. I wanted to add those genocides for historical reasons, but it is hard not to add a little message for anyone to know that this was no joke. Not gonna teach anyone anything, but I couldn't help writing this.
May all their souls rest in peace.
Now that Italy has taken all their rightful land, it is time we decide where our expansion will go.
The Balkan peninsula must belong to us.
Our decline has been slow, but steady. We must do something to change the fate of our country before it's too late.
Spain must stay as still as possible.
Our destiny is reclaiming what used to belong to us in Europe.
Our destiny is reclaiming what used to belong to us in the Americas.
With the great defat Egypt suffered, They say it is time they end all trouble we brought upon them.
Egypt will remain, even if it is not in the map.
Event to make $COUNTRY$ not too biggy
This is a event to make $COUNTRY$ not a mess in the future.
A German diplomat has approached us with a deal, they want to buy Palau from us.
They accepted ur deal and are willing to give us that island.
Mongolia has been under Russian leadership for so long that they must be protected from China.
The German Empire controls the coast of Kenya. We can reach an agreement to get that land in exchange of Heligoland.
A Britih diplomat has brought to use an agreement: We secede Kenya in exchange of Heligoland. This deal might seem a little unfair, but it is our decision to choose what we want.
Germany has accepted and now we have more ports in the African continent.
Our proposal was bitterly dismissed. Now they control all the Coast of Kenya.
Poland and Lithuania are currently fighting against Russian rule. Should we intervene?
We want to keep good relations with Russia.

After enjoying a birthrate boom during the early 19th century, population growth in Germany started to decline to levels more similar to those of its neighbors in $YEAR$. Families are now having fewer children and overall birthrates are not as before as the population moves from the fields to the cities and the German society become more and more industrialized.
But that won't slow Germany down.
You're the worst scum of the earth and you deserve what's coming for you
We have violated international law by breaching the infamy limit. The nation suffers greatly for the misbehaviour of our Leader!
You're below infamy limit once again!

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has requested we join their union under the "we are stronger together" excuse. Our small country might not resist an attack from $FROMCOUNTRY$, so, maybe, the best we can do is to give it up.
Yes, we accept to take part in their union.
They can go straight to hell.

Polish nobles and scholars in our great city are starting a great revolution to restore Poland and end serfdom in our lands. This democratic movement is gathering momentum and might erupt at any time through Polish occupied lands. We can support it, incurring the anger of our neighbors and possibly invasion, or we can suppress it.
Let the revolutionaries take the city. Unite Poland!
Suppress the revolutionaries or the Austrians might retaliate.

In 1820, the American Colonization Society (ACS) began sending African American volunteers to the Pepper Coast to establish a colony for freed African Americans. The ACS, a private organization supported by prominent American politicians such as Abraham Lincoln, Henry Clay, and James Monroe, believed repatriation was preferable to emancipation of slaves, and they founded a colony on what is known as Liberia. The colony of Liberia was poor and economically dependent on the ACS, resulting that by the 1840s, the ACS was effectively bankrupt: Liberia had become a financial burden for it. When the American Colonization Society intimated that Liberia should cease its dependency on it, Joseph Roberts, the colony first black governor, proclaimed it an independent republic in $YEAR$.
Pay their debts and keep the colonies.
With the support of Russia, we can now be free from the rule of the crescent.
